title: Blondie Heaven
directions: Line a 9x13 pan with tin foil. Set aside.
In bowl of stand mixer combine butter and both sugars. Cream together until light and fluffy(about 4 min.).
Add in eggs and vanilla and beat until smooth.
Turn mixer to low and mix in flour, baking powder and salt until just combined.
Bake for 30-35 minutes until edges are golden and bars are just set up. Don't over-bake!
When ready to cut, remove bars from the pan by lifting foil.
